title: 480 pw-3 bed in Thane Villas,Islington,N7 Ref: 241
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Thane Villas,Islington,N7
£480.00 Per Week
Ref: 241

Property Details
We are happy to offer this amazing Large 3 bed apartment situated in a well maintained Victorian building, Thane Villas, Islington, N7

The property consists of:
* Newly Refurbished, bright and spacious large 3 bed apartment situated on the third floor of a period conversion.
* Newly renovated to a high standard the property boasts a fully fitted kitchen, 3 double bedrooms and large reception room , high ceilings and two shower rooms
* Thane Villas is ideally located moments from local shops and amenities and Islington’s fashionable Upper Street is also close by offering a fantastic range of shops, bars and restaurants.
* The closest stations are Holloway Road, Arsenal and Finsbury Park (Piccadilly, Victoria lines, Northern line and National Rail)
